item.title: Naan Kavingyanum Illai: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Ah, black and white! **Naan kavingyanum illai nalla rasiganum illai kaadhalenum aasai illa bommayum illai naan kavingyanum illai** IÂ´m no poet Not a great fan either
